result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kevin OBrian Sylvas

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Kevin OBrian Sylvas not in court, in custody.  Attorney Sylvan Jaspen appeared by video for Kevin OBrian Sylvas.  Prosecuting attorney Michael J. Odden in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Jaspen was just appointed to the case and does not have discovery or an offer and is requesting a status conference.  Case is adjourned to 12-8-22 at 8:30 am for status conference by zoom.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for December 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with QLM; JHA (DOB 1/11/2008); KBS (DOB 10/21/2016); KMS (12/12/2017); KCW (10/1/2010)
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5 with Electronic Monitoring; no contact order. If an Electronic Monitoring Device (GPS) is unavailable and Cash Bail has been paid, Defendant to be released and placed on the Electronic Monitoring (GPS) waiting list. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Kevin OBrian Sylvas appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Colleen A Taylor appeared by video for Kevin OBrian Sylvas.  Attorney Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Kevin OBrian Sylvas
Current: 8606 W Potomac Ave, Milwaukee, WI 53225 United States  (Effective: 10-12-2022)
Prior: 3546 East Layton Avenue, #A, Cudahy, WI 53110
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
